Pre-Game Insights: Portland hosts Philadelphia aiming to continue its three-game home winning streak.
The Trail Blazers are 8-7 on their home court and average 15.4 turnovers per game.
The 76ers are 7-8 on the road and 4-11 in games decided by 10 points or more.
Portland's shooting percentage (44.3%) is lower than Philadelphia's (47.7%) allowed to opponents.
Deni Avdija averages 13.3 points, 5.8 rebounds, and 3.2 assists for Portland.
Tyrese Maxey averages 26 points, 5.4 assists, and two steals for Philadelphia.
Portland's last 10 games: 3-7, averaging 110.3 points and 45.9% shooting.
Philadelphia's last 10 games: 7-3, averaging 109.0 points and 45.9% shooting.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Portland's home advantage and recent form are discussed.
Key player injuries for both teams include Robert Williams III, Matisse Thybulle, Jared McCain, Andre Drummond, Eric Gordon, and KJ Martin.
